alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 11:05AM MST until January 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 PM this afternoon. The heaviest snow is expected between 8 AM and 2 PM. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills, as low as zero degrees, could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
